title: Sitar For Mental Health
subtitle: HSBC presents ‘SFMH’ - Rishab Rikhiram Sharma
location: Silver Oak Plantation, 25, Mudalappa St, Anjanadri Layout, Konanakunte, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560062
description:
Sitar for Mental Health events are immersive experiences that bridge ancient practices of sound and energy medicine using traditional Indian music, designed to invoke states of deep reflection, receptivity, and introspection.

Sitarist, music producer, and mental health advocate, Rishab Rikhiram Sharma, is made for the spotlight and his multi-faceted career is shaping up to be nothing short of iconic. Rishab presents his massive fourth Pan India SFMH Tour across eleven cities. Bringing awareness towards Mental health by inducing education and experiences of the auditory sensory processing system which Classical music brings forth and re-introduces the sound of the Sitar as a transformational tool.

title: Seedhe Maut - Lunch Break India Tour 2024
subtitle: Still On A Lunch Break!
description:
Catch the 'best in the business' in a city near you! Seedhe Maut are taking their hit mixtape on a massive 12-city pan-India tour. The dynamic duo, known for their explosive live performances, will be playing an extended set and will feature several special guests as well as a few surprises! Get your tickets now! 

Having mastered the art of delivering razor-sharp rhymes - this Delhi-based duo comprising Encore ABJ and Calm has used their lyrical dexterity to push forward the boundaries of Hip-Hop in India. Presenting Hindi Rap in a revolutionary new format, Seedhe Maut is taking the industry by storm and is unanimously regarded as the next big thing to break in the rapidly growing subculture landscape.

Age Restriction: 16+

title: SCC SkyCinema - Ticket To Paradise
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: Konanakunte Cross Metro Station, Anjanadri Layout, Konanakunte
description:
"There’s Not Enough Alcohol In The World.” - Ticket to Paradise

We have a ticket to paradise for you and the seatmate you bring along for the screening of this exciting new film, starring everyone's favorite duo, George Clooney and Julia Roberts playing a divorced couple who team up to sabotage the impending wedding of their daughter in Bali. 

Enjoy your favorite movie on a breezy terrace, perched on the rooftop of Forum South Bangalore Mall. Here you'll have an unobstructed view of the night sky, creating a unique and immersive cinema experience as you sink into comfy bean bags or mattresses and watch the movie on a large screen with the skyline of the city as your backdrop.

Screening Schedule: 

30th March, Saturday - Ticket to Paradise

Gates open at 7:00 pm and the movie starts at 7.30 pm

title: SCC Picnic Cinema - The Grand Budapest Hotel
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
description:
"Rudeness is merely an expression of fear. People fear they won't get what they want." - The Grand Budapest Hotel

Embark on a journey to the whimsical world of Wes Anderson as Sunset Cinema Club presents a special screening of this visually enchanting film. Join us for an evening of cinematic elegance, where the charm of the Grand Budapest as its eccentric characters come to life at our venue in Garden City Beer Collective. Come for an evening of cinematic delight, as the sun goes down, and the show comes on! Enjoy a picnic-y ambiance, where you can sit or even lie down on comfy bean bags, surrounded by lush green grass! String lights illuminate the area, casting a warm glow that sets the perfect mood for the evening, while you enjoy your favorite film on a large screen with surround sound accompanied by delicious munchies and drinks!

title: Shreya Ghoshal “All Hearts Tour" - Bengaluru
subtitle: By Superhits 93.5 RED FM
description:
Superhits 93.5 RED FM brings Shreya Ghoshal, All hearts tour Bengaluru RED LIVE
in Concert Co-presented by Kalaluha.
Let's experience the magic of Shreya Ghoshal's All Hearts Tour in Namma
Bengaluru. Prepare to be captivated by the mesmerizing blend of Shreya Ghoshal's
soulful voice and magnetic stage presence, accompanied by a talented band that
infuses energy and finesse into every performance.

title: Mid Wicket Stories
venue: ITC Gardenia, a Luxury Collection Hotel
description: Stumps Up for Stories: An Evening with Cricket's Icons Sir Geoffrey Boycott and Sunil Gavaskar. Calling all cricket fans for timeless conversation. Join us for an unforgettable evening as we discuss the legends who shaped the game we love. Don't miss this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to hear the inside stories from the heroes of cricket. They are going to discuss cricket stories from the time when the internet was not there. Get ready for a journey back in time as we bring together legendary cricketers for a timeless conversation that transcends eras! From Yesterday's Glory to Today's Inspiration: Join us for an unforgettable evening of cricket stories and timeless wisdom from the cricketing legends who've shaped the game we adore. It's not just an event; it's a pilgrimage for every cricket fan seeking to relive the magic of yesteryears.

title: Soul Smoke
venue: Hard Rock Cafe, St Marks Rd
location: 40, St Marks Rd, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description: Prepare for an unforgettable Thursday night in Bengaluru where Soul Smoke performing live at Bengaluru`s amazing entertainment hotspot Hard Rock Cafe. Electric Beats, Killer Tunes, Finger Licking Food, Spectacular Cocktails, And Many More! Come And Join The Party!

title: The Spaven D&B Curation
location: 1st floor of Gillys redefined,# 413, 100 Feet Road,, 4th Block, Koramangala, KHB Block Koramangala, Koramangala 4-B Block, 5th Block, Koramangala
description: Saras Co. presents The Spaven D&B Curation, a special curation, and reinterpretation of timeless jungle classics by UK-based producer/composer and drummer Richard Spaven, with Chris 'Fatty' Hargreaves on bass, supported by Mumbai’s very own Drum and Bass. Experience the finest live D&B from the UK through a unique sonic journey, exploring the roots of jungle and drum & bass while paying homage to the architects of sound system culture. Richard will be joined by Christopher Hargreaves (Fatty Bassman) on bass. Expect classics, and improvisation, all while honoring the origins of Jungle/D&B. Stick around for an intimate talk/dialogue with Richard Spaven, delving into the significance of classic tunes and offering a deeper understanding of their cultural impact and enduring relevance, while dissecting the tunes that shaped a movement.

title: Tribute to KK Ft. Root Three Five
location: Unit G-25 & 26, Ground Floor, Park Square Mall International Tech Park, Bangalore, Pattandur Agrahara
description: Tribute to KK Ft. Root Three Five (From Hyderabad) Root Three Five (35) exploded onto the live music scene after winning the Nxt Big Star competition in 2017. The Root 35 band blends soulful Indian and Western music and unique ideas. The band blends soulful Indian and Western music with high-energy rock and unique ideas. Every member brings in their distinct sound and personality to collectively form a tight performing unit. In a short period, they have gained a lot of traction and love from their audiences. So what are you waiting for? Catch them performing live KK`s hits. Just reserve your spots and be ready to experience a night full of rock `n` roll.

title: Disco Holi With Ranvijay Singh & Gautam Gulati
subtitle: Step into a world of color and music
location: passport office, Mantri Avenue, next to Koramangala, KHB Games Village, Koramangala
description: Join us on March 24th with Ranvijay Singh and 25th with Gautam Gulati for two days of unforgettable festivities and joyous revelry. Experience pulsating beats, immersive performances, and a fusion of traditional and contemporary entertainment that will keep you dancing from sunset till dawn. Secure your spot now for an experience like no other!

title: Pet Fiesta a Pet Festival at Marriott Whitefield
subtitle: Free
datetime: 3:00 PM - 11:59 PM Bengaluru Marriott Hotel Whitefield
venue: Plot No 75, 8th Rd, EPIP Zone, Whitefield

title: Madmen India Tour Bengaluru (Madoc X Omen)
location: 26, Haralur Main Rd, near HP Petrol Station, Amblipura, PWD Quarters, 1st Sector, HSR Layout
description: Experience the electrifying fusion of Madoc and Omen, now known as Madmen. Since their inception in 2022, they've stormed the stages of top festivals like Sunburn and shared the spotlight with EDM giants Dimitri Vegas & Like Mike. In their own words, "What started as a random collaboration became an organic journey filled with unity." Don't miss the chance to witness their seamless synergy—a musical journey like no other

title: Jatt Punjabi Night| 28th Mar|Thursday
subtitle: Free
venue: 26, Haralur Main Rd, near HP Petrol Station, Amblipura, PWD Quarters, 1st Sector, HSR Layout

title: Married Men These Days
location: Building No.480, KHB Colony, 5th Block, Koramangala
description: Welcome to the most hilarious celebration of love – it`s the "Married Men These Day" Standup Line Up! Grab your sweetheart, leave the kids with the babysitter, and get ready for a night of gut-busting laughter as our seasoned comics navigate the ups and downs of married life. Picture this: a lineup of witty husbands who`ve mastered the art of surviving "These Days". From the quest for the perfect gift to the delicate dance of planning the ideal date night, our comedians will take you on a rollercoaster of relatable anecdotes and side-splitting observations about the challenges and triumphs of being married on the most love-filled day of the year. Expect uproarious tales of last-minute flower shopping, attempts at romantic gestures gone wrong, and the eternal struggle to decode the mysteries of the perfect Love Greeting card.

title: Ridiculous - Stand Up Comedy Show
location: 178, 5th Main Rd, Binnamangala, Hoysala Nagar, Indiranagar
description: About the show: Prepare yourself for an unforgettable evening of laughter as "Ridiculous" takes center stage with four of the wittiest stand-up comedians hailing from the vibrant city of Bangalore. Join us for a comedy extravaganza that blends the city`s tech-savvy charm, cultural quirks, and the unique flavor of everyday life. Ridiculous promises an evening filled with relatable humor delivered with the unique comedic flair that sets Bangalore`s stand-up comedy scene apart.

title: Rangholi 2024 - Holi Concert
subtitle: Free
venue: Princess Academy, Palace Grounds, 9, Bellary Rd, Jayamahal

title: CrossOver Music Festival
subtitle: Unwind. Experience. Relive.
location: 26/1, Rooftop, World Trade Center, Dr Rajkumar Rd, Malleshwara
description:
Bangalore’s very own music festival - CrossOver Music Festival is back in your city with a massive Artist Line up & Production like never seen before this April. Brace yourselves, techno lovers. 

#CentiGradeTurns11Edition

6th April: Hunter/Game (Afterlife) + Ranjana & many more

7th April: Almost Human B2B Mafaiza + Sidbit & many more

title: Goa, Holi aur Gulaab Jamoon
subtitle: 3 Day Holi trip to Goa
description:
Experience a crazy Holi Pool Party with DJ beats blasting, vibrant colors all around, and endless laughter fun!
Plus, we`ve got your transport covered to and fro Bangalore (27/03/24 Madiwala: 5 30pm, Dairy Circle 6 15 pickups, Majestic Metro Station: 7 30 pm) so all you need to do is sit back, relax, and prepare for Goa and enjoy the ride!
You`ll be treated to a luxurious stay at a 4-star resort right in front of the beach, complete with complimentary breakfast to kickstart your days in Goa!
Day 1 kicks off with a bang as we dive headfirst into the HOLLYWOOD EVENT! Get ready for an epic fusion of colors, music, and pure excitement! As the sun sets, we`ll light up the night with a mesmerizing Lantern Festival followed by a bonfire under the stars!
